name.en: Global Climate Change crisises to opportunities
name.ch: 全球氣候變遷-從危機到轉機

goal.en: The 2013 IPCC report pointed out that human activities are “extremely likely> 95％“ to cause global warming. It is estimated that the temperature will rise by 0.3 °C to 4.8 °C in 2100, and the sea level will rise by 26-81 cm, which may lead to enhance the intensities of droughts and typhoons, summer Arctic ice melt. IPCC experts believe that the global temperature rise should be controlled within 2°C higher than that before the industrial revolution in the 18th century. Therefore, by 2050, global greenhouse gas emissions should be reduced by at least 50％, and developed countries should be reduced by 80％. In 2015 COP21, 195 countries adopted the Paris Agreement, which aims to “control the increase in global average temperature to well below 2°C above pre-industrial levels, and strive to limit the increase in temperature to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels.” Within 1.5° C to strengthen the global response to the threat of climate change. In 2021, more than 130 countries around the world have announced that they will achieve net-zero emissions goals by 2050 and work together to fight global warming. Taiwan declared on 110.4.22 that “the 2050 net-zero transformation is the goal of the whole world and also the goal of Taiwan.“ This course aims to introduce and discuss the evidence of global warming, the causes of global warming, the trend and prediction of global warming, the crisis of global warming, the impact of climate change on Taiwan, and the mitigation and adaptation of global climate change, so that students understand that global climate change is a global and intergenerational science.
goal.ch: 2013IPCC報告指出人類活動” 極為可能的（extremely likely>95％）”導致地球暖化，預估2100年氣溫將上升0.3 oC 至4.8 oC，海面上升26-81公分，並可能導致乾旱、颱風等強度增強，夏天北極冰層融解。IPCC專家認為全球上升溫度應控制在高於十八世紀工業革命前2℃內，為此2050年全球溫室氣體排放至少應減少50％，而已開發國家更應減少80％。2015COP21有195 個國家通過了《巴黎協定》，其旨在通過“將全球平均氣溫升幅控制在工業化前水準以上遠低於 2°C 之內，並努力將氣溫升幅限制在工業化前水準以上 1.5°C 之內”加強全球應對氣候變化的威脅。2021全球已有超過130國家宣布2050年達成淨零排放目標，協力合作對抗全球暖化。我國110.4.22宣示「2050淨零轉型是全世界的目標，也是臺灣的目標」。本課程旨在藉由全球暖化的證據、全球暖化的成因、全球暖化的趨勢與預測、全球暖化的危機、氣候變遷對台灣的影響、以及全球氣候變遷的減緩與調適等課題之導引和探討，使學生瞭解全球氣候變遷乃為全球性和跨世代之科學。同時藉由學生學習目標的建立，氣候變遷相關新聞媒體的閱讀和觀賞，氣候變遷論壇相關議題的討論，氣候變遷議題的分組報告及綜合報告，培育地球村公民維護地球環境必備之知識，以期向地球永續發展目標邁進。

. Course schedule and content
Chapter 1 Evidence of Global Warming-Climate Variability and Warming Phenomena
Global temperature and sea surface temperature

Midterm Exam

Heavy rain, drought, storm, snowstorm and heat wave
Impact on environment ecology and human health
Chapter 5 The Impact of Climate Change on Taiwan-Climate Change and Its Impact
The impact of climate change on national health
Chapter 6 Mitigation and Adaptation of Global Climate Change - International Conventions and Agreements
Kyoto Protocol Mechanisms and Low-Carbon Cities
Energy Utilization and Green Energy Technology
Final Exam
